title: Labour MP calls for a ‘clearout’ of advisers in Downing Street amid Mandelson scandal - UK politics live
summary_full: Pressure continued to build on Keir Starmer to remove his chief of staff Morgan McSweeneyParliament’s intelligence and security committee (ISC) has published a letter explaining how documents relating to Mandelson’s appointment as US ambassador will be published.A key requirement is that all communications between Mandelson and ministers, government officials and special advisers (such as Starmer’s chief of staff Morgan McSweeney) must be published. Continue reading...
